official_title: A bill to increase the size of the Upper Neches River corridor unit of, and to add the Village Creek unit to, the Big Thicket National Preserve in the State of Texas.
short_title: Big Thicket National Preserve Addition Act of 1986

summary.text: Big Thicket National Preserve Addition Act of 1986 - Expands the Big Thicket National Preserve, Texas.

titles.title: Big Thicket National Preserve Addition Act of 1986
A bill to increase the size of the Upper Neches River corridor unit of, and to add the Village Creek unit to, the Big Thicket National Preserve in the State of Texas.
